<input class="form-control app-textbox"
       focus-target
       role="input"
       [type]="type"
       [attr.name]="name"
       [(ngModel)]="datavalue"
       [readonly]="readonly"
       [required]="required"
       [disabled]="disabled"
       [min]="minvalue"
       [max]="maxvalue"
       [step]="step"
       [attr.tabindex]="tabindex"
       [attr.placeholder]="placeholder"
       [attr.accesskey]="shortcutkey"
       [autofocus]="autofocus"
       (blur)="handleBlur($event)"
       (ngModelChange)="handleChange($event)"
       [autocomplete]="autocomplete ? 'on' : 'off'"
       #input>

<input class="form-control app-textbox"
       focus-target
       type="color"
       role="input"
       [attr.name]="name"
       [(ngModel)]="datavalue"
       [readonly]="readonly"
       [required]="required"
       [disabled]="disabled"
       [maxlength]="maxchars"
       [attr.tabindex]="tabindex"
       [attr.placeholder]="placeholder"
       [attr.accesskey]="shortcutkey"
       [autofocus]="autofocus"
       (blur)="handleBlur($event)"
       (ngModelChange)="handleChange($event)"
       #input>

<input class="form-control app-textbox"
       focus-target
       role="input"
       type="email"
       [attr.name]="name"
       [(ngModel)]="datavalue"
       [ngModelOptions]="ngModelOptions"
       [readonly]="readonly"
       [required]="required"
       [disabled]="disabled"
       [maxlength]="maxchars"
       [pattern]="regexp"
       [attr.tabindex]="tabindex"
       [attr.placeholder]="placeholder"
       [attr.accesskey]="shortcutkey"
       [autofocus]="autofocus"
       (blur)="handleBlur($event)"
       (ngModelChange)="handleChange($event)"
       [autocomplete]="autocomplete ? 'on' : 'off'"
       (keyup.enter)="flushViewChanges(input.value)"
       email
       #input>

<input class="form-control app-textbox"
       [ngClass]="{'step-hidden': step === 0}"
       focus-target
       role="input"
       type="number"
       [attr.name]="name"
       [(ngModel)]="datavalue"
       [ngModelOptions]="ngModelOptions"
       [readonly]="readonly"
       [required]="required"
       [disabled]="disabled"
       [maxlength]="maxchars"
       [min]="minvalue"
       [max]="maxvalue"
       [step]="step"
       [attr.tabindex]="tabindex"
       [attr.placeholder]="placeholder"
       [attr.accesskey]="shortcutkey"
       [autofocus]="autofocus"
       (blur)="handleBlur($event)"
       (ngModelChange)="handleChange($event)"
       [autocomplete]="autocomplete ? 'on' : 'off'"
       (keyup.enter)="flushViewChanges(input.value)"
       (keydown.ArrowUp)="onArrowPress($event)"
       (keydown.ArrowDown)="onArrowPress($event)"
       (keypress)="validateInputEntry($event)"
       #input>

arguments.selector: wm-input[type="text"], wm-input:not([type]), wm-input[type="password"], wm-input[type="search"], wm-input[type="tel"], wm-input[type="url"]
arguments.template:
<input class="form-control app-textbox"
       focus-target
       role="input"
       [type]="type"
       [attr.name]="name"
       [(ngModel)]="datavalue"
       [textMask]="mask"
       [ngModelOptions]="ngModelOptions"
       [readonly]="readonly"
       [required]="required"
       [disabled]="disabled"
       [maxlength]="maxchars"
       [pattern]="regexp"
       [attr.tabindex]="tabindex"
       [attr.placeholder]="placeholder"
       [attr.accesskey]="shortcutkey"
       [autofocus]="autofocus"
       (ngModelChange)="handleChange($event)"
       (blur)="handleBlur($event)"
       [autocomplete]="autocomplete ? 'on' : 'off'"
       (keyup.enter)="flushViewChanges(input.value)"
       #input>
<ng-content></ng-content>
{{item.label}}

<input class="form-control app-textbox app-number-input"
       inputmode="numeric"
       focus-target
       [attr.name]="name"
       role="input"
       type="text"
       [ngModel]="displayValue"
       [readonly]="readonly"
       [disabled]="disabled"
       [pattern]="regexp"
       [attr.tabindex]="tabindex"
       [attr.placeholder]="placeholder"
       [attr.accesskey]="shortcutkey"
       [autofocus]="autofocus"
       (ngModelChange)="datavalue=$event"
       (blur)="handleBlur($event)"
       [ngModelOptions]="ngModelOptions"
       [required]="required"
       (keypress)="validateInputEntry($event)"
       (keydown.enter)="onEnter($event)"
       (keydown.ArrowUp)="onArrowPress($event, 'UP')"
       (keydown.ArrowDown)="onArrowPress($event, 'DOWN')"
       #input>
{{badgevalue}}

<select role="input" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" #select
        focus-target
        [ngClass]="['app-select form-control', class]"
        [disabled]="disabled"
        [required]="required"
        [tabindex]="tabindex"
        [(ngModel)]="modelByKey"
        [multiple]="multiple"
        (change)="onSelectValueChange($event)"
        (blur)="invokeOnTouched($event)"
        [attr.name]="name"
        [autofocus]="autofocus"
>
  <option selected value="undefined" [textContent]="placeholder" [hidden]="!placeholder" ></option>
  <option
          *ngFor="let item of datasetItems"
          [value]="item.key" [selected]="item.selected" [textContent]="item.label"></option>
</select>
{{selectedItem ? selectedItem.label : modelByKey}}

<textarea class="form-control app-textarea"
          focus-target
          role="input"
          [attr.name]="name"
          [(ngModel)]="datavalue"
          [ngModelOptions]="ngModelOptions"
          [readonly]="readonly"
          [required]="required"
          [disabled]="disabled"
          [maxlength]="maxchars"
          [attr.tabindex]="tabindex"
          [attr.placeholder]="placeholder"
          [attr.accesskey]="shortcutkey"
          [autofocus]="autofocus"
          (blur)="handleBlur($event)"
          (ngModelChange)="handleChange($event)"
          #textarea
></textarea>
